sourceDesc.p: M.R. James, Descriptive Catalogue of the Manuscripts in the Library of Corpus Christi College, Cambridge 1912

projectDesc.p: The James Catalogue was digitized then marked up following the TEI P5 Guidelines. The customized model was provided by Giuliano Di Bacco, stored in an ODD file (parkerweb.xml): the latter was written by GDB using ROMA vers. 2.x, with manual adaptations. The ODD file is used as a source to compile the actual schema used to validate the xml: it is advisable to compile it in RelaxNG sintax (parkerweb.rnc) through ROMA.

msDesc.head: Richard of Saint-Victor OSA (attrib.), Tractatus de conceptione beatae Mariae, Tractatus de conceptione Christi
? Ric. de S. Victore
msDesc.p: Vellum, 235 175 , 9.6 x 7, ff. 13 + 56, 30 lines to a page. Cent. xiii, in a good hand. Damaged at the top by damp.

Titulus primo folio inscriptus, et uti videtur, a quodam alio codice divulsus, induxit Stanleium ut hunc codicem nominaret librum Hugonis de Girunde de penitentia. On f. ir Liber Hugonis de Girunde de penitencia magdal.; repeated on f. iir. In the Eastry Catalogue of Christ Church, Canterbury, no. 1310 (Ancient Libraries, p. 113) is Liber H. de Gerunde de penitencia Magdalene. H. de Gerunde was living in 1239.
Also a monogram of the letters M. W. very neatly drawn: repeated on f. iir.

On f. iv a late collect for Pope Innocent (VIII ?):
Deus omnium fidelium pastor et rector famulum tuum Innocencium quem pastorem ecclesie tue etc.
On ff. iir-iiiv is a very faint copy in pencil of a document relating to tithes. The name Ricard. de Walinge is discernible and dicte ecclesie de cliue twice.

Ad initium codicis occurit successio archiepiscoporum Cantuar. ab Augustino ad Ioannem Peccham. On f. ivr a list of Archbishops of Canterbury with length of their archiepiscopates:
Sanctus augustinus sedit xvi annos
...
Iohannes de Pecham sedit xiiij ann. ix septimanas vac. ii. ann.
These flyleaves more properly belong to MS 226, which seems once to have been a part of this volume.
The remaining leaves (ff. 55v-xiiiv) are blank except for about three pages of old pencil-writing at the end.

msItem.head: Richard of Saint-Victor OSA (attrib.), Tractatus de conceptione beatae Mariae
msItem.incipit: In agro booz ruth moabitis messorum sequens uestigia
msItem.explicit: diuine nos hostium misericordie celi hostiaria introducat
in ipsa magnificemur per eum qui est super omnia sanctus et benedictus in secula. Amen

msItem.head: Richard of Saint-Victor OSA (attrib.), Tractatus de conceptione Christi
msItem.incipit: Liber generationis Ihesu Christi ... Abraham. Sacram christi incarnationem antiqui patres
msItem.explicit: cum iterum uenerit accipiat nos ad se ipsum ut ubi est ipse et nos simus ubi cum patre et spiritu sancto uiuit et regnat deus per omnia secula seculorum. Amen
